data.description:
In this sandbox VR adventure you'll start with a blank canvas of empty land.  Explore levels from many environments and find hundreds of unique items to keep for yourself or trade to grow your homestead into whatever you wish.  Grow and harvest crops, hunt for the elusive Morel mushroom, and find rarities to give you valuable commodities for trade.  Use your metal detector and trusty shovel to find and secure many different treasures.  Let out your inner nature enthusiast and photograph beautiful and sometimes rare animals.  The path you take is yours to choose.  Every homestead will be unique.  What will you create?

Try out the new Creator Mode!

changelog.change_log:
-Added over 200 new Homestead Items to purchase in the Farmer's Market. 
-You can now search for Metal Detector Items in you Homestead Map.
-Fixed the Old Car in the Texas Ranch Quest so it can now be completed.

A big thank you to everyone who has played the game. We just released our Creator Mode update.

CREATOR MODE: In this mode you will start out your game with $1,000,000. This will allow you to completely focus on building your homestead right away. This mode is for anyone who would like to just focus on building their homestead without having to do things in the game to earn money like forage, harvest crops, metal detect, and take on quests.

ACTIVATING CREATOR MODE: You can active Creator Mode by starting a new game and then right after the beginning homestead previews it will ask you if you would like to start your game in Normal Mode or Creator Mode.

TIME CHANGE ITEM: We have a new item that can be purchased at the Misc Vendor under the Misc category. This new Time Change item will allow you to change from Day/Night in an instant. This will be helpful for anyone doing quests or looking for items or creatures that can only be found or completed at certain times of the day.

TUTORIAL SKIP BUTTON: We have added a Skip button to the beginning tutorial panels. If you have already played the game and done the tutorials and are just wanting to start a new game, you can now skip through the tutorials if you like.

OTHER SMALL FIXES: There are a handful of other small fixes as well like the Grizzly Bear Quest and the Walking Skeleton Quest.

We hope you enjoy the update! Please reach out to us at support@morelshomestead.com if you have any issues, questions, or suggestions. Be sure to check your junk mail for replies.

-The Abrams Studios Team

-Old saved games that were crashing should now load.

-The Grizzly Bear quest should now be able to be completed.

-The sword and spyglass can now be sold at the Misc vendor under the Collectables Category.
Added golf clubs and balls to the Misc Vendor in the Farmer's Market so they can be sold. Fixed the collision on the Tropical Shack.

Tropical Update!

-2 New homesteads. Beach Island and Tropical Land.

-2 New explorable maps. Flamingo Island and Willow Tree Golf Course. Both maps also feature many new animals, quests, collectables, and more.

-Seashell Hunting.

-New sprinkler system you can purchase for your garden boxes. You can purchase them by trigger clicking on the garden boxes to bring up their item menu. After purchasing you will see the sprinkler system working. You will no longer need to manually water the plants in the garden box. You can still purchase fertilizer and manually fertilize plants if you would like them to grow faster.

-New save slots. Just make sure you can have multiple saved games and there are no issues loading or saving them.

-All maps have had their graphics slightly updated.

-A "Sell All Seashells and Metals" button has been added to the Misc Vendor.

-Blewit Mushrooms have been added to the new maps.

-2 new garden seeds. Coconut tree and a pineapple tree.

-Many new homestead items to purchase in the Farmer's Market.

-Other minor updates and fixes.

A quick update with some bugs that were introduced with the last update.


FIXES:

-Fixed an issue with the camera getting attached to your quick slot items if you retrieved a quick slot item while holding your camera.

-Fixed bugs with quick slots.

-Fixed bugs with missing homestead items.

-Fixed an issue where sometimes homestead preview meshes were not showing up unless you click the thumbnail twice.

-Fixed issues with wall snapped objects staying attached to the buildings they were in.

-Other small bugs and updates.


Please reach out to us at support@morelshomestead.com if you have any issues, questions, or suggestions. Be sure to check your junk mail for replies. 

-The Abrams Studios Team

A big thank you to everyone who has played the game and for all of the feedback. We are listening.


FIXES AND UPDATES:

-Added a new “Sell All” button to the Mushroom and Produce stand. This will make it much easier and faster to sell your items.

-Added wall snapping for pictures and shelves to the interior of buildings.

-Updated the way homestead items are taken out of your inventory. It should be much easier to take out homestead items now.

-Increased rewards for quests. 

-Fixed bugs with quick slots.

-Fixed bugs with missing homestead items.

-Fixed some potential crash issue bugs.

-Fixed issues where players could lose their saved game.

-Updated some collision issues on some homestead buildings.

-Other small bugs and updates.


We hope you enjoy the update! We have a lot of new and exciting things planned for future updates including some new maps. Please reach out to us at support@morelshomestead.com if you have any issues, questions, or suggestions. Be sure to check your junk mail for replies. 

-The Abrams Studios Team

Quick patch to fix the mushroom vendor panel from sometimes not showing it. It will now always be visible. 

If anyone has any issues at all, please reach out to us at support@morelshomestead.com.

We want to thank everyone who has purchased the game. Thank you for all of the feedback as well. 

The last update we fixed the economy system to make it easier to earn money. We also added several new settings like Strafe, Smooth Rotation Speed, and Walk Speed. In this update we tried to focus on some of the bugs that some of you were encountering.

FIXES:

-Fixed the garden/farming bug that caused some plants to quit growing fruits or vegetables.

-Fixed a bug that would sometimes cause the mushroom vendor panel to not show up.

-Increased texture memory to prevent the occasional blurry texture.

-Fixed a bug that would sometimes cause inventory items to not auto retrieve and would be lost forever.

-Added a setting to change Auto Retrieve Settings for tools. Currently if you were to leave a tool like a flashlight on the ground it would auto retrieve to your inventory after 10 seconds or when leaving a map. There are now settings under Controls to change the amount of time before this happens or to completely disable it.

-Fixed LOD issues on some of the tree groups purchased for your homestead.

-Disabled audio playing on level transitions. There was a crash issue related to audio playing during level transitions. Disabling audio playing there should fix this crash.

-Updated German translation.

-Fixed collision issue on the cabin in Cabin in the Woods that would prevent you from using free motion locomotion to walk through the door

-We changed the default rotation for new users to Snap Rotation. A lot of new users didn’t know you could change the rotation settings and the default smooth rotation settings were making a lot of new users get motion sickness. This will not change anyone’s current settings. This will only be the new default settings for new players of the game.

-Other misc fixes


We hope you enjoy the update! Please reach out to us at support@morelshomestead.com if you have any issues.

-The Abrams Studios Team

We want to thank everyone who has purchased the game. Thank you for all of the feedback as well. We’ve been listening and wanted to do a quick update to address some of the common issues and requests.

UPDATES:

-The money system has been updated. It is much easier to earn money now.
 
-Strafe has been added. It will be enabled by default.

-Smooth turn speed has been increased by default.

-There are now several new settings including walk speed, smooth rotation speed, and strafe speed.

FIXES:

-The metal detector quest has been fixed so you do not lose progress if you leave the map before finishing.


We hope you enjoy the update!

-The Abrams Studios Team

Milestone Delivery

Prototype homestead. 
The start of the Farmer's Market.
There are 7 maps. 
They each have a daytime and nigh time scene that you can test with a press of a button
 
Press "B" to go back to the main menu anytime to pick a new location
Press "Y" to turn off music and just have the sounds of nature.
Press "X" to change toggle the maps between Day and Night.
